features.title: New Normal Dashboards
features.desc: Normal dashboards are now created in the new version by default, and your Normal dashboards can be converted with the click of a button!

features.title: Redesigned Home
features.desc: The home page is now cleaner and more modern, while still providing an informative overview!

features.title: New Emulator Features
features.desc: The new device emulator introduces functions that you can insert into your payload and a timer to automate your simulation!
